title: The Wandering Owl and the Midnight Map

scenes.text: A pale owl drops a wax-sealed envelope at your window. Inside: an invitation to a midnight lecture at the mysterious Academy of Moonlight. Do you go?

choices.label: Slip out now and follow the owl
Ignore it — it's probably a prank
Open the window and call out to the owl

scenes.text: You trail the owl through foggy lanes to a cobbled square where an archway appears out of mist. A faint glow pulses behind the arch.

choices.label: Step through the arch into the glow
Wait and watch the arch
Run back home — this is getting too strange

scenes.text:
You toss the envelope into a drawer. Later that week you find a feather in the drawer that hums when you hold it. Perhaps you should have gone.

THE END — Curiosity Waits.
The owl lands on your sill and tilts its head. It leaves a small map that shows three markers: the Arch, the Lantern, and the Clocktower.

choices.label: Follow the map to the Lantern
Follow the map to the Clocktower
Go to the Arch (the map's first marker)

scenes.text: You step into a room filled with floating books. A kind-looking professor offers two items: a quill that writes answers, and a compass that points to hidden doors.

choices.label: Take the quill (instant wisdom)
Take the compass (secret paths)
Refuse both — learn the hard way

scenes.text: You watch the arch and see a parade of odd students pass through: some laughing, some whispering spells. One student stops and waves at you before vanishing. You feel invited.

choices.label: Walk through after them
Walk home — this is silly

scenes.text: A brass lantern shows you not the path, but a memory: the moment you first believed in magic. Warmth fills you and you understand courage.

choices.label: Use the lantern's courage to go to the Clocktower
Carry the lantern with you and explore the grounds

scenes.text: At the top of the clocktower, a shimmering portal reveals three futures: Quiet Life, Legendary Spellcraft, or Wandless Wandering.

choices.label: Choose Quiet Life (a peaceful home)
Choose Legendary Spellcraft (fame & study)
Choose Wandless Wandering (adventure)

scenes.text:
The quill writes truths you didn't know you needed. You sail through the first test night, answering riddles while the library applauds.

You are offered a place as an apprentice scribe.

THE END — A Scholar's Light.
With the compass you discover a hidden door behind ivy. Beyond it: a garden of mirrors showing what you could be. One mirror shows you teaching a circle of eager students.

choices.label: Step into the teaching mirror future
Shatter the mirror and keep exploring

scenes.text:
You decline both items and are led to a solitary room of challenges that test wit and heart. You pass with grit and earn the respect of the academy.

THE END — Earned, Not Gifted.

You go back to bed. In the morning, a note tucked under your door reads: "Next year, perhaps." It smells faintly of moonlight.

THE END — Safe and Sound.
Exploring the grounds you meet a sprite who offers to show you a secret performance at midnight if you bring a song. You now know the way to music and mischief.

choices.label: Learn a song and attend the performance
Politely decline and become the sprite's friend

scenes.text:
You choose a life of quiet charm: cozy cottage, late-night tea, a small garden where owls sometimes land. You keep a lantern on the windowsill.

THE END — Cozy & Content.

You dive into study and your name becomes a whisper in great halls. New spells are attached to your initials, and students travel to see your lecture scrolls.

THE END — A Name in the Margins.

No wand? No problem. You step through the portal and wander from academy to academy, helping in ways no spellbook could chart. Stories follow you like lantern light.

THE END — The Wandless Path.
Teaching suits you. Seasons pass in chalk dust and laughter. You craft new puzzles for bright minds and find joy in small discoveries.

At midnight the performance is a small riot of music and light. You join in the chorus and the sprite gifts you a feather that never rustles — a token of belonging.

THE END — Songbound.

The sprite and you exchange stories until dawn. You learn the secret of tiny kindnesses that change the world in small ways.

THE END — Friend of Sprites.
